label.phrase: it has become clear to me that after the orchestrated politically inspired media event staged a few weeks ago that this campaign will ultimately be focused not on issues but on one unflattering photograph

maybe that's what the obama campaign has intended and we think it is worthy of some attention by our campaign in the early aspects of the ad we have images of other celebrities that demonstrate that the focus of the obama campaign has been as much to create that celebrity status of his as it is to discuss the hard issues that the american public are forced to debate during the course of this campaign
